author: Lorem Ipsum
caption: Yoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.
about: The practice of yoga has been thought to date back to pre-vedic Indian traditions, possibly in the Indus valley civilization around 3000 BCE. Yoga is mentioned in the Rigveda, and also referenced in the Upanishads,though it most likely developed as a systematic study around the 5th and 6th centuries BCE, in ancient India's ascetic and Śramaṇa movements.

author: Ayush goyal
caption: Inhale the future. Exhale the past
about: Yoga gurus from India introduced yoga to the West following the success of Vivekananda's adaptation of yoga without asanas in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. The term 'yoga' in the Western world often denotes a modern form of hatha yoga and yoga as exercise, consisting largely of the asanas
